Details: Operational 2009, commissioned 2012. fills gap in coverage caused by loss of Skrunda-1 radar
Two radars at this site. One is currently operational and covers the south west, the second stage covers the south/south-east and could replace Gabala Radar Station in Azerbaijan.

Location: Pionersky Radar Station at former Dunayevka air base near Pionersky, Kaliningrad
Details: Operational (in part) November 2011. Fully operational by 2014
Daryal-U radar demolished June 2011, new radar being tested in April 2012.
Would replace current Daryal radar, claimed to start 2015
Would replace Dnestr/Daugava radar at this site, claimed to start 2017

Coordinates: May be the former radar site at Yeniseysk
